itemDescription: Scottish minister and professor of chemistry and humanity

wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Forbes (1776–1847) was a Scottish minister who served as Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland for the period 1829 to 1830. He was Professor of Humanities and Chemistry at the University of Aberdeen.

response: *Patrick Forbes second charge 1816 to 1847, Moderator in 1829

link_mentions.page: List of Moderators of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland

response: Forbes was born and educated in Bermuda, the son of Dr. Francis Forbes M.D. and his wife Mary, née Tucker. His elder half-brother was Very Rev Patrick Forbes who was Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1829.
Patrick Forbes (1564–1635) was a Scottish churchman.
Patrick Forbes  may also refer to:
*Patrick Forbes (bishop of Caithness) (1611–1680), Scottish bishop of Caithness
*Rev Patrick Forbes minister of Boharm around 1810 Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1829
In 1830 he succeeded Very Rev Patrick Forbes as Moderator.
